title: Rally | Analysis of immune response in COVID-19
description: Antibodies are proteins produced by immune cells in response to infectious challenges such as viruses. We will isolate the immune cells and antibodies against SARS-CoV-2, the causative agent for Corona Virus Infectious Disease (COVID-19).
